plot outline: Guna 369 is the story of happy-go-lucky guy falling in love with Gita at first sight. The Writer and Director Arjun Jhandyala was inspired this story from real life true incidents. Guna on one side struggles get her to love him and on the other; stand up for his friends and lovely family. Guna gets trapped in a criminal case changes the dynamics of the film. With twists and turns Guna unravels the case himself and how he solves out the crux of the situation is all about.
title: Guna 369
plot: Guna (Karthikeya) is a happy-go-lucky guy who believes the solution to solving issues is not through violence but through compromise. But what happens when he's forced to the extremes by someone close to him?

_Guna 369_ (qv) is the story of happy-go-lucky guy falling in love with Gita at first sight. The Writer and Director Arjun Jhandyala was inspired this story from real life true incidents. Guna on one side struggles get her to love him and on the other; stand up for his friends and lovely family. Guna gets trapped in a criminal case changes the dynamics of the film. With twists and turns Guna unravels the case himself and how he solves out the crux of the situation is all about.
